Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? So
tomorrow's the <RED>Starry Night Festival</RED>,
right? I came here to tell you about it.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Didn't your old town also have a Starry
Night Festival. Usually, it's a time to
enjoy the stars with family and friends.
<PAGE>
Well, in this town it's a bit different.
It's long been our tradition here for
<RED>couples</RED> to gaze at the stars together.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sounds pretty romantic, huh? Many in
town got to know their future spouses
at past Starry Night Festivals.
<PAGE>
Even after marriage, couples still go to
the festival. If they have children,
they'll get someone to watch them.
<PAGE>
Of course, it's not mandatory, so it's
up to whether or not you want to go
view the stars that night.
<PAGE>
If you do want to attend, it would be
best to make plans to go with someone
sometime today.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
